name.baseName: 含铜废液|再生铜、含铜再生原料|化学提取|所有规模

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisAerobic biological treatment + anaerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management65，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisAerobic biological treatment + anaerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management65，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
technology.technologicalApplicability: 含铜废液再生工艺设计用于通过化学提取回收铜和制备含铜再生原料，适用于各种规模。该过程支持在多个行业中重用铜，包括电子和建筑行业。末端处理技术用于处理具体污染物：物理化学处理用于处理镉、砷和铅污染，效率为10%，而铬去除的效率达到50%。结合厌氧和好氧生物处理来处理氨氮和化学需氧量，技术效率分别达到60%和65%。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码42,四级代码4210文件，在完整版文件中第2461页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: 源文件中描述为为再生铜、含铜再生原料，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution cadmiumisPhysicochemical treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management10，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
污染物指标镉的末端治理技术是物理化学处理法，其效率为10，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=废水治理设备运行时间（小时/间）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为镉，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisAerobic biological treatment + anaerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management60，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
污染物指标氨氮的末端治理技术是好氧生物处理法+厌氧生物处理法，其效率为60，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=废水治理设备运行时间（小时/间）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氨氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution arsenicisPhysicochemical treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management10，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
污染物指标砷的末端治理技术是物理化学处理法，其效率为10，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=废水治理设备运行时间（小时/间）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为砷，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution leadisPhysicochemical treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management10，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
污染物指标铅的末端治理技术是物理化学处理法，其效率为10，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=废水治理设备运行时间（小时/间）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为铅，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution ChromiumisPhysicochemical treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management50，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of wastewater treatment facilities (kWh/year) / operating time of wastewater treatment facilities (hours/year) / total power of wastewater treatment facilities (kW)
污染物指标铬的末端治理技术是物理化学处理法，其效率为50，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=废水治理设备运行时间（小时/间）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为铬，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisAerobic biological treatment + anaerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management65，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
污染物指标化学需氧量的末端治理技术是好氧生物处理法+厌氧生物处理法，其效率为65，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为/。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为化学需氧量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
